feed.title: Dawarich Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.16.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Speed is now being recorded into points when a GPX file is being imported. Previously, the speed was not being recorded.
  • GeoJSON file from GPSLogger now can be imported to Dawarich. Previously, the import was failing due to incorrect parsing of the file.

Changed

  • The Vists suggestion job is disabled. It will be re-enabled in the future with a new approach to the visit suggestion process.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Fix recording speed from GPX file by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/374

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.16.0...0.16.1

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.16.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Exported GPX file now being correctly recognized as valid by Garmin Connect, Adobe Lightroom and (probably) other services. Previously, the exported GPX file was not being recognized as valid by these services.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Update gpx serializer to make it a valid gpx file by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/373

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.16.1...0.16.2

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.16.3
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Make ActionCable respect REDIS_URL env var. Previously, ActionCable was trying to connect to Redis on localhost.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.16.2...0.16.3

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.16.4
entry.content:
Added

  • Admins can now see all users in the system on the Users page. The path is /settings/users.

Changed

  • Admins can now provide custom password for new users and update passwords for existing users on the Users page.
  • The bin/dev file will no longer run bin/rails tailwindcss:watch command. It's useful only for development and doesn't really make sense to run it in production.

Fixed

  • Exported files will now always have an extension when downloaded. Previously, the extension was missing in case of GPX export.
  • Deleting and sorting points on the Points page will now preserve filtering and sorting params when points are deleted or sorted. Previously, the page was being reloaded and filtering and sorting params were lost.

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Bump rspec-rails from 7.0.1 to 7.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/389
  • Bump sidekiq from 7.3.4 to 7.3.5 by @dependabot in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/388
  • Basic user management by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/378
  • Fix missing file extension in gpx export files by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/392
  • Fix points params preserved by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/393

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.16.3...0.16.4

entry.title: New release for Dawarich: 0.16.5
entry.content:
Changed

  • Dawarich now uses POST /api/search/metadata endpoint to get geodata from Immich.

Added

  • A guide on how to install Dawarich with k8s

ðŸ’™ This release is supported by James Manolios, chenrik and aldumil on Patreon ðŸ’™

What's Changed

  • Create How_to_install_Dawarich_in_k8s.md by @shaman007 in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/398
  • fix: Redis container missing name in compose-file by @hernil in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/401
  • Use POST /api/search/metadata endpoint to get geodata from Immich by @Freika in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/414

New Contributors

  • @shaman007 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/398
  • @hernil made their first contribution in https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/pull/401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Freika/dawarich/compare/0.16.4...0.16.5
